featured.text: However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.
He devoted himself to photography all his life.
In 1964, Morrison got divorced and devoted herself to writing.
A group in the UK even started a website devoted to “beating Blue Monday.”

definition.zh_def: 奉獻，專心於某事物或某活動
definition.en_def: To give a large part of one's time or resources to a particular activity or purpose.
definition.example: She decided to devote her life to helping others.
